displayName.english: You're just as bad as them.
displayName.german: Du bist genauso schlimm wie sie.

description.english: Kill a scientist.
description.spanish: Mata a un científico.
description.german: Töte einen Wissenschaftler.
description.french: Tuez un scientifique.
description.italian: Uccidi uno scienziato.
description.russian: Убейте учёного.
description.schinese: 杀死一名科学家。
description.tchinese: 殺死一名科學家。
description.portuguese: Mata um cientista.

description.english: Complete Power Up.
description.german: Vernichte den Gargantua in Power Up.
description.french: Anéantissez le Gargantua dans Power Up.
description.italian: Annienta il Gargantua in Power Up.
description.spanish: Annihila al Gargantua en Power Up.
description.schinese: 在 Power Up 中消灭加冈图亚。
description.tchinese: 在 Power Up 中消滅加岡圖亞。
description.russian: Уничтожьте Гаргантюа в Power Up.
description.portuguese: Aniquila o Gargantua em Power Up.

description.english: Complete Gonarch's Lair.
description.german: Vernichte die Gonarch.
description.french: Anéantissez la Gonarch.
description.italian: Annienta la Gonarch.
description.spanish: Annihila a la Gonarch.
description.schinese: 消灭戈纳克。
description.tchinese: 消滅戈納克。
description.russian: Уничтожьте Гонарха.
description.portuguese: Aniquila o Gonarch.

description.english: Complete Uplink.
description.spanish: Completa Uplink.
description.german: Schließe Uplink ab.
description.french: Terminez Uplink.
description.italian: Completa Uplink.
description.russian: Завершите Uplink.
description.schinese: 完成 Uplink。
description.tchinese: 完成 Uplink。
description.portuguese: Conclui o Uplink.

description.english: Complete the Hazard Course.
description.spanish: Completa el Curso de Peligros.
description.german: Schließe den Gefahrenkurs ab.
description.french: Terminez le parcours d’entraînement.
description.italian: Completa il Corso di Addestramento.
description.russian: Завершите Hazard Course.
description.schinese: 完成 Hazard Course。
description.tchinese: 完成 Hazard Course。
description.portuguese: Conclui o Hazard Course.

description.english: Sit through the Tram Ride and complete Black Mesa Inbound.
description.spanish: Quédate sentado durante el trayecto del tranvía y completa Black Mesa Inbound.
description.german: Sitze die Tramfahrt ab und schließe Black Mesa Inbound ab.
description.french: Restez assis pendant le trajet du tram et terminez Black Mesa Inbound.
description.italian: Rimani seduto durante il viaggio in tram e completa Black Mesa Inbound.
description.koreana: 트램 이동을 끝까지 보고 Black Mesa Inbound를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Просмотрите всю поездку на трамвае и завершите Black Mesa Inbound.
description.schinese: 坐完整段电车旅程并完成 Black Mesa Inbound。
description.tchinese: 搭完整段電車旅程並完成 Black Mesa Inbound。
description.portuguese: Aguenta toda a viagem de elétrico e conclui Black Mesa Inbound.

description.english: Witness (and indirectly cause) the Black Mesa Incident and complete Anomalous Materials.
description.spanish: Presencia (y causa indirectamente) el Incidente de Black Mesa y completa Anomalous Materials.
description.german: Erlebe (und verursache indirekt) den Black-Mesa-Zwischenfall und schließe Anomalous Materials ab.
description.french: Assistez (et contribuez indirectement) à l’Incident de Black Mesa et terminez Anomalous Materials.
description.italian: Assisti (e contribuisci indirettamente) all’Incidente di Black Mesa e completa Anomalous Materials.
description.koreana: 블랙 메사 사건을 목격(그리고 간접적으로 유발)하고 Anomalous Materials를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Станьте свидетелем (и частично причиной) инцидента в Блэк Мезе и завершите Anomalous Materials.
description.schinese: 见证（并间接导致）黑山事故并完成 Anomalous Materials。
description.tchinese: 見證（並間接造成）黑山事件並完成 Anomalous Materials。
description.portuguese: Presencia (e causa indiretamente) o Incidente de Black Mesa e conclui Anomalous Materials.

description.english: Conform to Eli's mission and complete Unforeseen Consequences.
description.spanish: Cumple la misión de Eli y completa Unforeseen Consequences.
description.german: Folge Elis Auftrag und schließe Unforeseen Consequences ab.
description.french: Suivez la mission d’Eli et terminez Unforeseen Consequences.
description.italian: Asseconda la missione di Eli e completa Unforeseen Consequences.
description.koreana: 일라이의 지시에 따르고 Unforeseen Consequences를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Следуйте заданию Илая и завершите Unforeseen Consequences.
description.schinese: 听从 Eli 的任务并完成 Unforeseen Consequences。
description.tchinese: 遵從 Eli 的任務並完成 Unforeseen Consequences。
description.portuguese: Cumpra a missão do Eli e conclui Unforeseen Consequences.

displayName.english: Bad day to be Dr. Newell
displayName.spanish: Mal día para ser el Dr. Newell
displayName.french: Pas un bon jour pour le Dr Newell
displayName.italian: Brutta giornata per il dott. Newell
displayName.russian: Не лучший день для доктора Ньюэлла
displayName.schinese: 纽维尔博士的糟糕一天
displayName.portuguese: Mau dia para ser o Dr. Newell

description.english: Complete Office Complex.
description.spanish: Completa Office Complex.
description.german: Schließe Office Complex ab.
description.french: Terminez Office Complex.
description.italian: Completa Office Complex.
description.russian: Завершите Office Complex.
description.schinese: 完成 Office Complex。
description.tchinese: 完成 Office Complex。
description.portuguese: Conclui Office Complex.

displayName.english: Bad day to be part of the Science Team
displayName.spanish: Mal día para ser parte del equipo científico
displayName.italian: Brutta giornata per il team scientifico
displayName.russian: Не лучший день для научной команды
displayName.portuguese: Mau dia para pertencer à equipa científica

description.english: Survive the HECU infiltration and complete "We've Got Hostiles."
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la infiltración del HECU y completa «We've Got Hostiles».
description.german: Überlebe die HECU-Infiltration und schließe „We've Got Hostiles“ ab.
description.french: Survivez à l’infiltration du HECU et terminez « We've Got Hostiles ».
description.italian: Sopravvivi all’infiltrazione dell’HECU e completa «We've Got Hostiles».
description.koreana: HECU 침투를 살아남고 "We've Got Hostiles"를 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Переживите вторжение HECU и завершите «We've Got Hostiles».
description.schinese: 在 HECU 的突袭中生存并完成 “We've Got Hostiles”。
description.tchinese: 在 HECU 的突襲中倖存並完成「We've Got Hostiles」。
description.portuguese: Sobrevive à infiltração do HECU e conclui "We've Got Hostiles".

description.english: Complete Blast Pit.
description.spanish: Completa Blast Pit.
description.german: Schließe Blast Pit ab.
description.french: Terminez Blast Pit.
description.italian: Completa Blast Pit.
description.russian: Завершите Blast Pit.
description.schinese: 完成 Blast Pit。
description.tchinese: 完成 Blast Pit。
description.portuguese: Conclui Blast Pit.

description.english: Complete On a Rail.
description.german: Starte die Satellitenrakete und schließe On a Rail ab.
description.french: Lancez la fusée satellite et terminez On a Rail.
description.italian: Lancia il razzo satellitare e completa On a Rail.
description.koreana: 위성 로켓을 발사하고 On a Rail을 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Lanza el cohete satélite y completa On a Rail.
description.schinese: 发射卫星火箭并完成 On a Rail。
description.tchinese: 發射衛星火箭並完成 On a Rail。
description.russian: Запустите ракету-спутник и завершите On a Rail.
description.portuguese: Lança o foguetão satélite e conclui On a Rail.

description.english: Complete Apprenhension.
description.spanish: Completa Apprehension.
description.german: Schließe Apprehension ab.
description.french: Terminez Apprehension.
description.italian: Completa Apprehension.
description.russian: Завершите Apprehension.
description.schinese: 完成 Apprehension。
description.tchinese: 完成 Apprehension。
description.portuguese: Conclui Apprehension.

description.english: Complete the labyrinth that is Residue Processing.
description.spanish: Completa el laberinto que es Residue Processing.
description.german: Schließe das Labyrinth namens Residue Processing ab.
description.french: Terminez le labyrinthe qu’est Residue Processing.
description.italian: Completa il labirinto che è Residue Processing.
description.russian: Пройдите лабиринт Residue Processing.
description.schinese: 完成 Residue Processing 的迷宫。
description.tchinese: 完成 Residue Processing 的迷宮。
description.portuguese: Conclui o labirinto de Residue Processing.

displayName.english: You weren't authorized to know about that.
displayName.french: Vous n’étiez pas autorisé à savoir ça.
displayName.spanish: No estabas autorizado a saber eso.
displayName.russian: У вас не было доступа к этой информации.
displayName.portuguese: Não tinhas autorização para saber isso.

description.english: Complete Questionable Ethics.
description.german: Erlebe die schmutzigen Machenschaften der Black Mesa Research Facility und schließe Questionable Ethics ab.
description.french: Découvrez les magouilles du complexe Black Mesa et terminez Questionable Ethics.
description.italian: Assisti alle losche operazioni di Black Mesa e completa Questionable Ethics.
description.koreana: 블랙 메사의 은밀한 행위를 목격하고 Questionable Ethics를 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Presencia las sucias operaciones de Black Mesa y completa Questionable Ethics.
description.schinese: 目睹黑山研究所的阴暗勾当并完成 Questionable Ethics。
description.tchinese: 目擊黑山研究所的骯髒行徑並完成 Questionable Ethics。
description.russian: Узнайте о тёмных делишках Блэк Мезы и завершите Questionable Ethics.
description.portuguese: Presencia as práticas duvidosas da Black Mesa Research Facility e conclui Questionable Ethics.

description.english: Complete Surface Tension.
description.german: Erlebe den Gebietskampf zwischen Xenianern und HECU und schließe Surface Tension ab.
description.french: Assistez au combat territorial entre les Xeniens et le HECU, et terminez Surface Tension.
description.italian: Assisti alla lotta territoriale tra Xeniani e HECU e completa Surface Tension.
description.koreana: 제니안과 HECU 간의 영토 전투를 목격하고 Surface Tension을 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Presencia la lucha territorial entre los Xenianos y el HECU, y completa Surface Tension.
description.schinese: 目睹 Xen 生物与 HECU 之间的领地争夺战并完成 Surface Tension。
description.tchinese: 見證 Xen 生物與 HECU 之間的領地之爭並完成 Surface Tension。
description.russian: Станьте свидетелем борьбы за территорию между ксенианцами и HECU и завершите Surface Tension.
description.portuguese: Presencia a luta territorial entre os Xenians e o HECU e conclui Surface Tension.

description.english: Survive the mortars and complete "Forget About Freeman."
description.spanish: Sobrevive a los morteros y completa «Forget About Freeman».
description.german: Überlebe die Mörserangriffe und schließe „Forget About Freeman“ ab.
description.french: Survivez aux tirs de mortier et terminez « Forget About Freeman ».
description.italian: Sopravvivi ai colpi di mortaio e completa «Forget About Freeman».
description.koreana: 박격포 공격을 버티고 "Forget About Freeman"을 완료하십시오.
description.russian: Переживите миномётный обстрел и завершите «Forget About Freeman».
description.schinese: 在迫击炮攻击中幸存并完成 “Forget About Freeman”。
description.tchinese: 在迫擊砲轟擊中倖存並完成「Forget About Freeman」。
description.portuguese: Sobrevive aos morteiros e conclui "Forget About Freeman".

description.english: Complete Lambda Core.
description.german: Hilf dem Lambda-Komplex-Team und reise nach Xen.
description.french: Aidez l’équipe du Complexe Lambda et transportez-vous sur Xen.
description.italian: Aiuta il team del Complesso Lambda e trasportati su Xen.
description.koreana: 람다 콤플렉스 팀을 돕고 Xen으로 이동하십시오.
description.spanish: Ayuda al equipo del Complejo Lambda y transpórtate a Xen.
description.schinese: 帮助 Lambda 复合体团队并前往 Xen。
description.tchinese: 協助 Lambda 複合體團隊並前往 Xen。
description.russian: Помогите команде комплекса Лямбда и отправьтесь на Ксен.
description.portuguese: Ajuda a equipa do Complexo Lambda e transporta-te para Xen.

displayName.german: So schön, dass ich weinen könnte
displayName.portuguese: Tão bonito que dá vontade de chorar

description.english: Complete Xen.
description.german: Löse das erste Rätsel in Xen.
description.french: Résolvez la première énigme sur Xen.
description.italian: Risolvi il primo enigma su Xen.
description.spanish: Resuelve el primer puzle en Xen.
description.schinese: 解决 Xen 的第一个谜题。
description.tchinese: 解開 Xen 的第一個謎題。
description.russian: Решите первую головоломку на Ксене.
description.portuguese: Resolve o primeiro puzzle em Xen.

description.english: Complete Interloper.
description.german: Kämpfe dich durch Interloper.
description.french: Progressez dans Interloper.
description.italian: Fatti strada attraverso Interloper.
description.spanish: Ábrete paso por Interloper.
description.schinese: 穿越 Interloper。
description.tchinese: 通過 Interloper。
description.russian: Пройдите Interloper.
description.portuguese: Atravessa Interloper.

displayName.english: I think I just saved the world...
displayName.german: Ich glaube, ich habe gerade die Welt gerettet...
displayName.french: Je crois que je viens de sauver le monde...
displayName.italian: Credo di aver appena salvato il mondo...
displayName.spanish: Creo que acabo de salvar el mundo...
displayName.schinese: 我好像刚刚拯救了世界……
displayName.russian: Кажется, я только что спас мир…
displayName.portuguese: Acho que acabei de salvar o mundo...

description.english: Complete Nihilanth.
description.german: Töte den Nihilanth und beende den Black-Mesa-Zwischenfall ein für alle Mal.
description.french: Tuez le Nihilanth et mettez fin à l’Incident de Black Mesa une bonne fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Uccidi il Nihilanth e poni fine all’Incidente di Black Mesa una volta per tutte.
description.koreana: Nihilanth를 처치하여 블랙 메사 사건을 완전히 끝내십시오.
description.spanish: Mata al Nihilanth y pon fin al Incidente de Black Mesa de una vez por todas.
description.schinese: 杀死尼赫兰斯并彻底结束黑山事故。
description.tchinese: 殺死尼赫蘭斯，終結黑山事件。
description.russian: Убейте Нихиланtha и окончательно завершите инцидент в Блэк Мезе.
description.portuguese: Mata o Nihilanth e termina de vez o Incidente de Black Mesa.

description.english: Reject the offer. Goodbye, Dr. Freeman.
description.german: Lehne das Angebot des G-Man ab. Auf Wiedersehen, Dr. Freeman.
description.french: Refusez l’offre du G-Man. Adieu, Dr Freeman.
description.italian: Rifiuta l’offerta del G-Man. Addio, dott. Freeman.
description.koreana: G-맨의 제안을 거절하십시오. 안녕히, 프리맨 박사.
description.spanish: Rechaza la oferta del G-Man. Adiós, Dr. Freeman.
description.schinese: 拒绝 G-Man 的提议。再见，弗里曼博士。
description.tchinese: 拒絕 G-Man 的提議。再見了，佛里曼博士。
description.russian: Отклоните предложение G-Man'а. Прощайте, доктор Фримен.
description.portuguese: Recusa a proposta do G-Man. Adeus, Dr. Freeman.

description.english: Accept the offer.
description.german: Nimm das Angebot des G-Man an.
description.french: Acceptez l’offre du G-Man.
description.italian: Accetta l’offerta del G-Man.
description.spanish: Acepta la oferta del G-Man.
description.schinese: 接受 G-Man 的提议。
description.tchinese: 接受 G-Man 的提議。
description.russian: Примите предложение G-Man'а.
description.portuguese: Aceita a proposta do G-Man.

displayName.english: I'm not following you, you evil person!
displayName.german: Ich folge dir nicht, du böser Mensch!
displayName.french: Je ne te suis pas, espèce de monstre !
displayName.koreana: 당신을 따라가지 않을 거예요, 나쁜 사람!
displayName.schinese: 我不会跟着你，你这坏人！
displayName.tchinese: 我才不要跟著你，你這個壞人！
displayName.russian: Я за тобой не пойду, злодей!

description.english: In Unforeseen Consequences, kill the security guard fighting the zombie to take his gun.
description.german: In Unforeseen Consequences: Töte den Wachmann, der gegen den Zombie kämpft, um seine Waffe zu nehmen.
description.french: Dans Unforeseen Consequences, tuez le garde qui se bat contre le zombie pour prendre son arme.
description.italian: In Unforeseen Consequences, uccidi la guardia che combatte contro lo zombie per prendere la sua arma.
description.koreana: Unforeseen Consequences에서, 좀비와 싸우는 경비원을 죽여 그의 총을 빼앗으십시오.
description.spanish: En Unforeseen Consequences, mata al guardia que lucha contra el zombi para quedarte con su arma.
description.schinese: 在 Unforeseen Consequences 中，杀死与僵尸搏斗的警卫并拿走他的枪。
description.tchinese: 在 Unforeseen Consequences 中，殺死與殭屍搏鬥的警衛並拿走他的槍。
description.russian: В Unforeseen Consequences убейте охранника, дерущегося с зомби, чтобы забрать его оружие.
description.portuguese: Em Unforeseen Consequences, mata o segurança que luta contra o zombi e apodera-te da arma dele.

description.english: In Office Complex, find Barney's hideout.
description.german: Finde in Office Complex Barneys Versteck.
description.french: Dans Office Complex, trouvez la planque de Barney.
description.italian: In Office Complex, trova il rifugio di Barney.
description.spanish: En Office Complex, encuentra el escondite de Barney.
description.schinese: 在 Office Complex 中找到 Barney 的藏身处。
description.tchinese: 在 Office Complex 找到 Barney 的藏身處。
description.russian: В Office Complex найдите укрытие Барни.
description.portuguese: Em Office Complex, encontra o esconderijo do Barney.

description.english: Disengage the first turret in Office Complex.
description.spanish: Desactiva la primera torreta en Office Complex.
description.german: Deaktiviere den ersten Geschützturm in Office Complex.
description.french: Désactivez la première tourelle dans Office Complex.
description.italian: Disattiva la prima torretta in Office Complex.
description.koreana: Office Complex의 첫 번째 포탑을 해제하십시오.
description.russian: Отключите первую турели в Office Complex.
description.schinese: 在 Office Complex 中关闭第一座炮塔。
description.tchinese: 在 Office Complex 停用第一座炮塔。
description.portuguese: Desativa a primeira torre em Office Complex.

description.english: Find the Maintenance Area in Office Complex.
description.german: Finde den Wartungsbereich in Office Complex.
description.french: Trouvez la zone de maintenance dans Office Complex.
description.italian: Trova l’Area di Manutenzione in Office Complex.
description.spanish: Encuentra el Área de Mantenimiento en Office Complex.
description.schinese: 在 Office Complex 中找到维修区域。
description.tchinese: 在 Office Complex 找到維修區。
description.russian: Найдите зону технического обслуживания в Office Complex.
description.portuguese: Encontra a Área de Manutenção em Office Complex.

description.english: Find the grenade cache near the end of Office Complex.
description.german: Finde das Granatenversteck nahe dem Ende von Office Complex.
description.french: Trouvez la réserve de grenades vers la fin d’Office Complex.
description.italian: Trova la scorta di granate vicino alla fine di Office Complex.
description.koreana: Office Complex 끝자락 근처에서 수류탄 보관소를 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Encuentra el alijo de granadas cerca del final de Office Complex.
description.schinese: 在 Office Complex 末端附近找到手榴弹储藏处。
description.tchinese: 在 Office Complex 末段附近找到手榴彈儲藏處。
description.russian: Найдите склад гранат ближе к концу Office Complex.
description.portuguese: Encontra o esconderijo de granadas perto do fim de Office Complex.

description.english: Kill 15 barnacles.
description.spanish: Mata a 15 barnáculos.
description.german: Töte 15 Barnacles.
description.french: Tuez 15 barnacles.
description.italian: Uccidi 15 barnacle.
description.russian: Убейте 15 барнаклов.
description.schinese: 杀死 15 只藤壶怪（Barnacle）。
description.tchinese: 殺死 15 隻藤壺怪（Barnacle）。
description.portuguese: Mata 15 barnacles.

description.english: Destroy 5 turrets. (excludes ceiling mounted turrets)
description.spanish: Destruye 5 torretas. (excluye torretas de techo)
description.german: Zerstöre 5 Geschütze. (Deckengeschütze ausgenommen)
description.french: Détruisez 5 tourelles. (sauf les tourelles au plafond)
description.italian: Distruggi 5 torrette (escluse le torrette da soffitto).
description.russian: Уничтожьте 5 турелей (кроме потолочных).
description.schinese: 摧毁 5 座炮塔。（不包括天花板炮塔）
description.tchinese: 摧毀 5 座炮塔。（不包含天花板炮塔）
description.portuguese: Destrói 5 torres. (exclui torres de teto)

displayName.german: Mir läuft's eiskalt den Rücken runter

description.english: In Office Complex, solve the chiller puzzle.
description.spanish: En Office Complex, resuelve el puzle de la cámara frigorífica.
description.german: Löse im Office Complex das Kühlraumrätsel.
description.french: Dans Office Complex, résolvez l’énigme de la chambre froide.
description.italian: In Office Complex, risolvi l’enigma della cella frigorifera.
description.russian: В Office Complex решите головоломку в морозильной камере.
description.schinese: 在 Office Complex 中解开冷冻室谜题。
description.tchinese: 在 Office Complex 解開冷凍室謎題。
description.portuguese: Em Office Complex, resolve o puzzle da câmara frigorífica.

description.english: Kill 500 headcrabs.
description.german: Töte 500 Headcrabs.
description.french: Tuez 500 headcrabs.
description.italian: Uccidi 500 headcrab.
description.spanish: Mata a 500 headcrabs.
description.schinese: 杀死 500 只寄头蟹（Headcrab）。
description.tchinese: 殺死 500 隻寄頭蟲（Headcrab）。
description.russian: Убейте 500 хедкрабов.
description.portuguese: Mata 500 headcrabs.

displayName.english: Freed, in another kind of way

description.english: Kill 100 Alien Slaves. Don't worry, you'll come to regret this.
description.spanish: Mata a 100 Alien Slaves. No te preocupes, ya te arrepentirás.
description.german: Töte 100 Alien Slaves. Keine Sorge, das wirst du bereuen.
description.french: Tuez 100 Alien Slaves. Ne vous inquiétez pas, vous le regretterez.
description.italian: Uccidi 100 Alien Slave. Non preoccuparti: te ne pentirai.
description.koreana: Alien Slave 100마리를 처치하십시오. 걱정하지 마세요—후회하게 될 겁니다.
description.russian: Убейте 100 Alien Slave. Не волнуйтесь — ещё пожалеете.
description.schinese: 杀死 100 只 Alien Slave。别担心，你会后悔的。
description.tchinese: 殺死 100 隻 Alien Slave。別擔心，你會後悔的。
description.portuguese: Mata 100 Alien Slaves. Não te preocupes, vais arrepender-te.

displayName.spanish: No era la comida de Magnusson...
displayName.portuguese: Não era o almoço do Magnusson...

description.english: In Anomalous Materials, destroy, uh... you-know-who's lunch.
description.german: Zerstöre in Anomalous Materials... äh... du weißt schon wessen Mittagessen.
description.french: Dans Anomalous Materials, détruisez… euh… le repas de vous-savez-qui.
description.italian: In Anomalous Materials, distruggi... ehm... il pranzo di chi-sai-tu.
description.koreana: Anomalous Materials에서… 그 사람의 점심을 파괴하십시오.
description.spanish: En Anomalous Materials, destruye... eh... ya sabes qué almuerzo.
description.schinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中，毁掉……呃，那个人的午餐。
description.tchinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中毀掉……呃，你知道是誰的午餐。
description.russian: В Anomalous Materials уничтожьте… ну… чей-то обед.
description.portuguese: Em Anomalous Materials, destrói… bem… o almoço daquela pessoa.

description.english: In Anomalous Materials, open the Message Terminal.
description.german: Öffne in Anomalous Materials das Nachrichtenterminal.
description.french: Dans Anomalous Materials, ouvrez le terminal de messages.
description.italian: In Anomalous Materials, apri il Terminale dei Messaggi.
description.spanish: En Anomalous Materials, abre el Terminal de Mensajes.
description.schinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中打开信息终端。
description.tchinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中開啓訊息終端。
description.russian: В Anomalous Materials откройте терминал сообщений.
description.portuguese: Em Anomalous Materials, abre o Terminal de Mensagens.

description.english: In Anomalous Materials, dry your hands.
description.spanish: En Anomalous Materials, sécate las manos.
description.german: Trockne dir in Anomalous Materials die Hände.
description.french: Dans Anomalous Materials, séchez-vous les mains.
description.italian: In Anomalous Materials, asciuga le mani.
description.russian: В Anomalous Materials высушите руки.
description.schinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中擦干双手。
description.tchinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中擦乾雙手。
description.portuguese: Em Anomalous Materials, seca as mãos.

description.english: In Anomalous Materials, refuse to put on the HEV Suit.
description.spanish: En Anomalous Materials, rehúsate a ponerte el traje HEV.
description.german: Verweigere es in Anomalous Materials, den HEV-Anzug anzuziehen.
description.french: Dans Anomalous Materials, refusez d’enfiler la combinaison HEV.
description.italian: In Anomalous Materials, rifiuta di indossare la Tuta HEV.
description.koreana: Anomalous Materials에서 HEV 슈트를 입기를 거부하십시오.
description.russian: В Anomalous Materials откажитесь надевать костюм HEV.
description.schinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中拒绝穿上 HEV 防护服。
description.tchinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中拒絕穿上 HEV 防護服。
description.portuguese: Em Anomalous Materials, recusa vestir o fato HEV.

description.english: In We've Got Hostiles, find the base upon the conveyor belts.
description.german: Finde in We've Got Hostiles die Basis über den Förderbändern.
description.french: Dans We've Got Hostiles, trouvez la base au-dessus des convoyeurs.
description.italian: In We've Got Hostiles, trova la base sopra i nastri trasportatori.
description.koreana: We've Got Hostiles에서 컨베이어 벨트 위의 기지를 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: En We've Got Hostiles, encuentra la base sobre las cintas transportadoras.
description.schinese: 在 We've Got Hostiles 中找到传送带上的基地。
description.tchinese: 在 We've Got Hostiles 中找到位於傳送帶上的基地。
description.russian: В We've Got Hostiles найдите базу над конвейерными лентами.
description.portuguese: Em We've Got Hostiles, encontra a base sobre as esteiras.

description.english: Kill an assassin.
description.german: Töte eine Attentäterin.
description.french: Tuez une assassine.
description.italian: Uccidi un’assassina.
description.spanish: Mata a una asesina.
description.schinese: 杀死一名女刺客。
description.tchinese: 殺死一名刺客。
description.russian: Убейте ассасина.
description.portuguese: Mata uma assassina.

description.english: In Questionable Ethics, free the Alien Grunt.
description.german: Befreie in Questionable Ethics den Alien Grunt.
description.french: Dans Questionable Ethics, libérez l’Alien Grunt.
description.italian: In Questionable Ethics, libera l’Alien Grunt.
description.spanish: En Questionable Ethics, libera al Alien Grunt.
description.schinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中释放 Alien Grunt。
description.tchinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中釋放 Alien Grunt。
description.russian: В Questionable Ethics освободите Alien Grunt.
description.portuguese: Em Questionable Ethics, liberta o Alien Grunt.

displayName.english: A new toy! Can I play?
displayName.german: Ein neues Spielzeug! Darf ich spielen?
displayName.french: Un nouveau jouet ! Je peux jouer ?

description.english: In Questionable Ethics, activate the steriliser.
description.spanish: En Questionable Ethics, activa el esterilizador.
description.german: Aktiviere in Questionable Ethics den Sterilisator.
description.french: Dans Questionable Ethics, activez le stérilisateur.
description.italian: In Questionable Ethics, attiva lo sterilizzatore.
description.russian: В Questionable Ethics включите стерилизатор.
description.schinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中启动消毒器。
description.tchinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 啟動消毒器。
description.portuguese: Em Questionable Ethics, ativa o esterilizador.

description.english: In Questionable Ethics, retrieve the Tau Cannon.
description.german: Hol dir in Questionable Ethics die Tau-Kanone zurück.
description.french: Dans Questionable Ethics, récupérez le canon Tau.
description.italian: In Questionable Ethics, recupera il Tau Cannon.
description.spanish: En Questionable Ethics, recupera el Tau Cannon.
description.schinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中取回 Tau Cannon。
description.tchinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中取回 Tau Cannon。
description.russian: В Questionable Ethics заберите Tau Cannon.
description.portuguese: Em Questionable Ethics, recupera o Tau Cannon.

description.english: In Questionable Ethics, use the laser to destroy the wall.
description.german: Zerstöre die Wand mit dem Laser in Questionable Ethics.
description.french: Dans Questionable Ethics, utilisez le laser pour détruire le mur.
description.italian: In Questionable Ethics, usa il laser per distruggere il muro.
description.koreana: Questionable Ethics에서 레이저를 사용해 벽을 파괴하십시오.
description.spanish: En Questionable Ethics, usa el láser para destruir la pared.
description.schinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中使用激光摧毁墙壁。
description.tchinese: 在 Questionable Ethics 中使用雷射摧毀牆壁。
description.russian: В Questionable Ethics используйте лазер, чтобы разрушить стену.
description.portuguese: Em Questionable Ethics, usa o laser para destruir a parede.

displayName.italian: Io e il mio Tau Cannon
displayName.portuguese: Eu e o meu Tau Cannon

description.english: In Surface Tension, destroy the first Apache.
description.spanish: En Surface Tension, destruye el primer Apache.
description.german: Zerstöre in Surface Tension den ersten Apache.
description.french: Dans Surface Tension, détruisez le premier Apache.
description.italian: In Surface Tension, distruggi il primo Apache.
description.koreana: Surface Tension에서 첫 번째 아파치를 파괴하십시오.
description.russian: В Surface Tension уничтожьте первый Apache.
description.schinese: 在 Surface Tension 中摧毁第一架阿帕奇直升机。
description.tchinese: 在 Surface Tension 中摧毀第一架阿帕契直升機。
description.portuguese: Em Surface Tension, destrói o primeiro Apache.

displayName.english: Me and my Tau Cannon II
displayName.spanish: Mi Tau Cannon y yo II
displayName.french: Moi et mon canon Tau II
displayName.italian: Io e il mio Tau Cannon II
displayName.schinese: 我和我的 Tau 炮 II
displayName.tchinese: 我和我的 Tau 砲 II
displayName.portuguese: Eu e o meu Tau Cannon II

description.english: In Surface Tension, destroy the second Apache after leaving the dam.
description.spanish: En Surface Tension, destruye el segundo Apache después de salir de la presa.
description.german: Zerstöre in Surface Tension den zweiten Apache nach dem Verlassen des Staudamms.
description.french: Dans Surface Tension, détruisez le second Apache après avoir quitté le barrage.
description.italian: In Surface Tension, distruggi il secondo Apache dopo aver lasciato la diga.
description.koreana: Surface Tension에서 댐을 떠난 뒤 두 번째 아파치를 파괴하십시오.
description.russian: В Surface Tension уничтожьте второй Apache после выхода с дамбы.
description.schinese: 在 Surface Tension 中离开大坝后摧毁第二架阿帕奇直升机。
description.tchinese: 在 Surface Tension 中離開水壩後摧毀第二架阿帕契直升機。
description.portuguese: Em Surface Tension, destrói o segundo Apache depois de sair da barragem.

description.english: In Surface Tension, successfully dodge all the tripmines before descending.
description.spanish: En Surface Tension, esquiva con éxito todas las minas lapa antes de descender.
description.german: Weiche in Surface Tension erfolgreich allen Sprengfallen aus, bevor du hinabsteigst.
description.french: Dans Surface Tension, esquivez toutes les mines laser avant de descendre.
description.italian: In Surface Tension, schiva con successo tutte le mine laser prima della discesa.
description.koreana: Surface Tension에서 내려가기 전에 모든 트립마인을 성공적으로 피하십시오.
description.russian: В Surface Tension успешно увернитесь от всех лазерных мин перед спуском.
description.schinese: 在 Surface Tension 中下去之前成功躲开所有绊雷。
description.tchinese: 在 Surface Tension 中下去之前成功避開所有絆雷。
description.portuguese: Em Surface Tension, evita todas as minas laser antes de descer.

description.english: In Surface Tension, kill the Gargantua.
description.german: Töte den Gargantua in Surface Tension.
description.french: Dans Surface Tension, tuez le Gargantua.
description.italian: In Surface Tension, uccidi il Gargantua.
description.spanish: En Surface Tension, mata al Gargantua.
description.schinese: 在 Surface Tension 中杀死加冈图亚。
description.tchinese: 在 Surface Tension 中殺死加岡圖亞。
description.russian: В Surface Tension убейте Гаргантюа.
description.portuguese: Em Surface Tension, mata o Gargantua.

displayName.schinese: 两天的努力得到了回报

description.english: Reach the bottom of the Lambda Complex.
description.german: Du bist fast am Ziel. Erreiche den Boden des Lambda-Komplexes.
description.french: Vous êtes presque au but. Atteignez le bas du Complexe Lambda.
description.italian: Sei quasi arrivato. Raggiungi il fondo del Complesso Lambda.
description.koreana: 거의 다 왔습니다. 람다 콤플렉스 최하층에 도달하십시오.
description.spanish: Ya casi estás. Llega al fondo del Complejo Lambda.
description.schinese: 你快到终点了。抵达 Lambda 复合体底部。
description.tchinese: 你快到終點了。抵達 Lambda 複合體底部。
description.russian: Вы почти на месте. Доберитесь до нижнего уровня комплекса Лямбда.
description.portuguese: Estás quase no fim. Chega ao fundo do Complexo Lambda.

description.english: In Lambda Core, activate Pump Station 01.
description.german: Aktiviere Pump Station 01 in Lambda Core.
description.french: Dans Lambda Core, activez la Station de Pompage 01.
description.italian: In Lambda Core, attiva la Stazione di Pompaggio 01.
description.spanish: En Lambda Core, activa la Estación de Bombeo 01.
description.schinese: 在 Lambda Core 中启动 Pump Station 01。
description.tchinese: 在 Lambda Core 啟動 Pump Station 01。
description.russian: В Lambda Core активируйте Pump Station 01.
description.portuguese: Em Lambda Core, ativa a Pump Station 01.

description.english: In Lambda Core, activate Pump Station 02.
description.german: Aktiviere Pump Station 02 in Lambda Core.
description.french: Dans Lambda Core, activez la Station de Pompage 02.
description.italian: In Lambda Core, attiva la Stazione di Pompaggio 02.
description.spanish: En Lambda Core, activa la Estación de Bombeo 02.
description.schinese: 在 Lambda Core 中启动 Pump Station 02。
description.tchinese: 在 Lambda Core 啟動 Pump Station 02。
description.russian: В Lambda Core активируйте Pump Station 02.
description.portuguese: Em Lambda Core, ativa a Pump Station 02.

displayName.english: All of those puzzles have paid off
displayName.german: All die Rätsel haben sich gelohnt
displayName.spanish: Todos esos puzles han dado fruto

description.english: Reach Level A in the Lambda Complex.
description.german: Du bist so weit gekommen. Erreiche Level A im Lambda-Komplex.
description.french: Vous êtes allé loin. Atteignez le Niveau A dans le Complexe Lambda.
description.italian: Sei arrivato fin qui. Raggiungi il Livello A nel Complesso Lambda.
description.koreana: 여기까지 왔습니다. 람다 콤플렉스 A 레벨에 도달하십시오.
description.spanish: Has llegado muy lejos. Llega al Nivel A en el Complejo Lambda.
description.schinese: 你已经走到这一步了。到达 Lambda 复合体的 A 层。
description.tchinese: 你已經走很遠了。到達 Lambda 複合體 A 層。
description.russian: Вы зашли так далеко. Доберитесь до уровня A в комплексе Лямбда.
description.portuguese: Chegaste longe. Alcança o Nível A no Complexo Lambda.

description.english: Kill a Controller.
description.german: Töte einen Controller.
description.french: Tuez un Controller.
description.italian: Uccidi un Controller.
description.spanish: Mata a un Controller.
description.schinese: 杀死一名控制者（Controller）。
description.tchinese: 殺死一名控制者（Controller）。
description.russian: Убейте контроллера.
description.portuguese: Mata um Controller.

description.english: Welcome to Half-Life Legacy.
description.spanish: Bienvenido a Half-Life Legacy.
description.german: Willkommen bei Half-Life Legacy.
description.french: Bienvenue dans Half-Life Legacy.
description.italian: Benvenuto in Half-Life Legacy.
description.russian: Добро пожаловать в Half-Life Legacy.
description.schinese: 欢迎来到 Half-Life Legacy。
description.tchinese: 歡迎來到 Half-Life Legacy。
description.portuguese: Bem-vindo ao Half-Life Legacy.

description.english: In Surface Tension, destroy the third Apache on the cliffside.
description.spanish: En Surface Tension, destruye el tercer Apache en el acantilado.
description.german: Zerstöre in Surface Tension den dritten Apache am Felsenhang.
description.french: Dans Surface Tension, détruisez le troisième Apache sur la falaise.
description.italian: In Surface Tension, distruggi il terzo Apache sul dirupo.
description.koreana: Surface Tension에서 절벽가의 세 번째 아파치를 파괴하십시오.
description.russian: В Surface Tension уничтожьте третий Apache на уступе.
description.schinese: 在 Surface Tension 中摧毁悬崖边的第三架阿帕奇直升机。
description.tchinese: 在 Surface Tension 中摧毀崖邊的第三架阿帕契直升機。
description.portuguese: Em Surface Tension, destrói o terceiro Apache no precipício.

description.english: Heal yourself with a soda.
description.german: Heile dich mit einer Limonade.
description.french: Soignez-vous avec un soda.
description.italian: Cura te stesso con una bibita.
description.spanish: Cúrate con un refresco.
description.schinese: 用汽水治疗自己。
description.tchinese: 用汽水治療自己。
description.russian: Вылечитесь газировкой.
description.portuguese: Cura-te com um refrigerante.

description.english: In any desired order, complete the Hazard Course, Uplink, and Half-Life back to back. Doing them in one sitting is NOT required.
description.german: Schließe Gefahrenkurs, Uplink und Half-Life hintereinander ab.
description.french: Terminez le parcours d’entraînement, Uplink et Half-Life d’affilée.
description.italian: Completa il Corso di Addestramento, Uplink e Half-Life di seguito.
description.koreana: Hazard Course, Uplink, Half-Life를 연속으로 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Completa el Curso de Peligros, Uplink y Half-Life seguidos.
description.schinese: 连续完成 Hazard Course、Uplink 和 Half-Life。
description.tchinese: 連續完成 Hazard Course、Uplink 和 Half-Life。
description.russian: Завершите Hazard Course, Uplink и Half-Life подряд.
description.portuguese: Conclui Hazard Course, Uplink e Half-Life de seguida.

description.english: In Anomalous Materials, sound the alarm at the reception.
description.german: Löse in Anomalous Materials den Alarm an der Rezeption aus.
description.french: Dans Anomalous Materials, déclenchez l’alarme à l’accueil.
description.italian: In Anomalous Materials, attiva l’allarme alla reception.
description.koreana: Anomalous Materials에서 안내 데스크의 경보를 울리십시오.
description.spanish: En Anomalous Materials, activa la alarma en recepción.
description.schinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中拉响接待处的警报。
description.tchinese: 在 Anomalous Materials 中拉響接待處的警報。
description.russian: В Anomalous Materials включите тревогу на ресепшене.
description.portuguese: Em Anomalous Materials, ativa o alarme na receção.

description.english: Enable cheats.
description.german: Aktiviere Cheats.
description.french: Activez les cheats.
description.italian: Attiva i trucchi.
description.spanish: Activa los trucos.
description.schinese: 启用作弊。
description.tchinese: 啟用作弊。
description.russian: Включите читы.
description.portuguese: Ativa os cheats.

description.english: In Uplink, find the shotgun room.
description.german: Finde in Uplink den Raum mit der Schrotflinte.
description.french: Dans Uplink, trouvez la salle du fusil à pompe.
description.italian: In Uplink, trova la stanza del fucile a pompa.
description.spanish: En Uplink, encuentra la sala de la escopeta.
description.schinese: 在 Uplink 中找到霰弹枪房间。
description.tchinese: 在 Uplink 中找到霰彈槍房間。
description.russian: В Uplink найдите комнату с дробовиком.
description.portuguese: Em Uplink, encontra a sala da caçadeira.

description.english: In Nihilanth, find the one and only living scientist in one of the chambers.
description.german: Finde in Nihilanth in einer der Kammern den einzigen noch lebenden Wissenschaftler.
description.french: Dans Nihilanth, trouvez le seul scientifique encore vivant dans l’une des chambres.
description.italian: In Nihilanth, trova l’unico scienziato ancora vivo in una delle camere.
description.koreana: Nihilanth에서 방 중 하나에 있는 유일하게 살아 있는 과학자를 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: En Nihilanth, encuentra al único científico vivo en una de las cámaras.
description.schinese: 在 Nihilanth 的某个房间中找到唯一存活的科学家。
description.tchinese: 在 Nihilanth 的某個房間中找到唯一存活的科學家。
description.russian: В Nihilanth найдите единственного выжившего учёного в одной из камер.
description.portuguese: Em Nihilanth, encontra o único cientista ainda vivo numa das câmaras.

description.english: In On a Rail, find Dave Riller's signature.
description.german: Finde in On a Rail Dave Rillers Signatur.
description.french: Dans On a Rail, trouvez la signature de Dave Riller.
description.italian: n On a Rail, trova la firma di Dave Riller.
description.koreana: On a Rail에서 데이브 릴러의 서명을 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: En On a Rail, encuentra la firma de Dave Riller.
description.schinese: 在 On a Rail 中找到戴夫·里勒的签名。
description.tchinese: 在 On a Rail 中找到戴夫·里勒的簽名。
description.russian: В On a Rail найдите подпись Дейва Риллера.
description.portuguese: Em On a Rail, encontra a assinatura de Dave Riller.

displayName.italian: La terza volta è quella buona
displayName.spanish: A la tercera va la vencida

description.english: In Interloper, kill the Gargantua.
description.german: Töte in Interloper den Gargantua.
description.french: Dans Interloper, tuez le Gargantua.
description.italian: In Interloper, uccidi il Gargantua.
description.spanish: En Interloper, mata al Gargantua.
description.schinese: 在 Interloper 中击杀加甘图亚。
description.tchinese: 在 Interloper 中擊殺加甘圖亞。
description.russian: В Interloper убейте Гаргантюа.
description.portuguese: Em Interloper, mata o Gargantua.

description.english: Break 250 objects (crates, boxes, barrels, etc.)
description.german: Zerstöre 250 Objekte (Kisten, Boxen, Fässer usw.)
description.french: Détruisez 250 objets (caisses, boîtes, barils, etc.)
description.italian: Distruggi 250 oggetti (casse, scatole, barili, ecc.)
description.spanish: Rompe 250 objetos (cajas, barriles, etc.).
description.schinese: 打碎 250 个物体（箱子、木箱、桶等）。
description.tchinese: 打碎 250 個物體（箱子、木箱、桶等）。
description.russian: Разбейте 250 объектов (ящики, коробки, бочки и т.д.).
description.portuguese: Parte 250 objectos (caixas, barris, etc.).

description.english: In On a Rail, find the secret cache aside an elevator.
description.german: Finde in On a Rail neben einem Aufzug ein geheimes Lager.
description.french: Dans On a Rail, trouvez la cachette secrète près d’un ascenseur.
description.italian: In On a Rail, trova il deposito segreto accanto a un ascensore
description.koreana: On a Rail에서 엘리베이터 옆의 비밀 보관소를 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: En On a Rail, encuentra el alijo secreto junto a un ascensor.
description.schinese: 在 On a Rail 中找到电梯旁的秘密储藏点。
description.tchinese: 在 On a Rail 中找到電梯旁的秘密儲藏點。
description.russian: В On a Rail найдите тайник рядом с лифтом.
description.portuguese: Em On a Rail, encontra o esconderijo secreto junto a um elevador.

description.english: In Blast Pit, find the hidden chargers.
description.german: Finde in Blast Pit die versteckten Ladestationen.
description.french: Dans Blast Pit, trouvez les chargeurs cachés.
description.italian: In Blast Pit, trova i caricatori nascosti.
description.spanish: En Blast Pit, encuentra los cargadores ocultos.
description.schinese: 在 Blast Pit 中找到隐藏的充电器。
description.tchinese: 在 Blast Pit 中找到隱藏的充電器。
description.russian: В Blast Pit найдите скрытые зарядники.
description.portuguese: Em Blast Pit, encontra os carregadores escondidos.

description.english: In Apprehension, find the hidden cache.
description.german: Finde in Apprehension das versteckte Lager.
description.french: Dans Apprehension, trouvez la cachette secrète.
description.italian: In Apprehension, trova il deposito nascosto.
description.spanish: En Apprehension, encuentra el alijo oculto.
description.schinese: 在 Apprehension 中找到隐藏的储藏点。
description.tchinese: 在 Apprehension 中找到隱藏的儲藏點。
description.russian: В Apprehension найдите скрытый тайник.
description.portuguese: Em Apprehension, encontra o esconderijo oculto.

description.english: In Forget About Freeman, find the secret room.
description.german: Finde in Forget About Freeman den geheimen Raum.
description.french: Dans Forget About Freeman, trouvez la salle secrète.
description.italian: In Forget About Freeman, trova la stanza segreta.
description.koreana: Forget About Freeman에서 비밀 방을 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: En Forget About Freeman, encuentra la sala secreta.
description.schinese: 在 Forget About Freeman 中找到秘密房间。
description.tchinese: 在 Forget About Freeman 中找到秘密房間。
description.russian: В Forget About Freeman найдите секретную комнату.
description.portuguese: Em Forget About Freeman, encontra a sala secreta.

description.english: In Interloper, find the spiral.
description.german: Finde in Interloper die Spirale.
description.french: Dans Interloper, trouvez la spirale.
description.italian: In Interloper, trova la spirale.
description.spanish: En Interloper, encuentra la espiral.
description.schinese: 在 Interloper 中找到螺旋结构。
description.tchinese: 在 Interloper 中找到螺旋結構。
description.russian: В Interloper найдите спираль.
description.portuguese: Em Interloper, encontra a espiral.
